cutclean.name: CutClean
description: No furnaces required.
Ores and animal drops are automatically smelted.
Apple rates are 5%, flint rates are 90%
No lapis is needed for enchanting.

fireless.name: Fireless
description: You cannot take fire damage.

bowless.name: Bowless
description: You are not able to craft bows.

rodless.name: Rodless
description: Fishing rods are not craftable.

shieldless.name: Shieldless
description: Shields are not craftable.

blooddiamonds.name: Blood Diamonds
description: When mining a diamond ore, the player will take half a heart of damage.

timber.name: Timber
description: Breaking a log of a tree will cause the whole tree to fall down.

horseless.name: Horseless
description: You are not able to tame horses/donkeys.

timebomb.name: Timebomb
description: After killing a player, their loot will drop into a double chest.
The chest will explode 30 seconds later.

nofall.name: No-Fall
description: Fall damage is off.

bestpve.name: BestPvE
description: Each player will be added to the "Best PvE List" at the start of the game.
While being on the list , you will gain 1 extra heart every 10 minutes.
Once a player takes damage, the player will be removed from the list.
If you kill a player, you are added back to the list.

tripleores.name: Triple Ores
description: Ores drop in threes.

doubleores.name: Double Ores
description: Ores drop in pairs.

teaminventory.name: Team Inventory
description: Each team has an extra inventory that all members from the team can view by using /teaminventory.

noclean.name: No-Clean
description: Gives you 30 seconds of invincibility after a kill.
Attacking other players will remove this PvP Protection.

hasteyboys.name: Hastey Boys
description: Every tool you craft will have Efficiency 3 and Unbreaking 1

luckyleaves.name: Lucky Leaves
description: Trees have a 0.5% chance of dropping a Golden Apple.

bleedingsweets.name: Bleeding Sweets
description: On death a player drops 1 diamond, 5 gold, 1 book, 2 string and 16 arrows

doublegold.name: Double Gold
description: The original amount of gold will double when mined.

goldless.name: Gold Less
description: When gold is mined, it will disappear and is not obtainable.

flowerpower.name: FlowerPower
description: Break flowers to receive items.

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
description: When you shoot someone, you trade places with them

veinminer.name: Vein Miner
description: Mining a block while crouched breaks blocks of the same type in a chain reaction
Only works when using the correct tool for the block type

dragonrush.name: DragonRush
description: In dragon rush the goal is to kill the dragon.
The first team to kill the dragon wins!
There is a end portal at 0 0

loveatfirstsight.name: Love At First Sight
description: In this scenario you are not able to choose your teammates through the team selection inventory.
Teams are created by clicking on someone in game.

fastleavesdecay.name: Fast Leaves Decay
description: In this scenario after breaking all logs of a tree the leaves will be gone within seconds

skyhigh.name: Sky High
description: In this scenario after 30 minutes you will start taking damage every 30 seconds while not above y=120

fastsmelting.name: Fast Smelting
description: In this scenario item smelting is sped up 5 times.

superheroes.name: Super Heroes
description: Each player will gain a special ability.
The powers are speed 1, strength 1, resistance 2, invisibility, 6 extra hearts, and jump boost 4.

anonymous.name: Anonymous
description: All player names are distorted.

gonefishing.name: Gone Fishing
description: At the beginning of the game everyone gets a lure 3 luck of the sea 3 rod.

infiniteenchants.name: Infinite Enchants
description: At the beginning of the game everyone gets 64 enchantment tables, anvils, lapis blocks and a lot of XP.

childrenleftunattended.name: Children Left Unattended
description: When a teammate dies you receive a speed potion and a tamed wolf.

silentnight.name: Silent Night
description: At night death messages, name tags, and chat are disabled.

permakill.name: PermaKill
description: When a player dies, it toggles perma day/night.

weakestlink.name: Weakest Link
description: Every 10 minutes the person with the least health will perish.
If everyone is at the same health no one will die.

eggs.name: Eggs
description: When you throw an egg, a random mob will spawn where it lands.
This includes enderdragons and withers.
When you kill a chicken, there is a 5% chance of it dropping an egg.

nogoingback.name: No Going Back
description: Once you go through a nether portal in the overworld, you can't go back to the overworld.

doubledates.name: Double Dates
description: Players join with a chosen team and are combined randomly with another team.

flyhigh.name: Fly High
description: Players spawn with a elytra.

randomizeddrops.name: Randomized Drops
description: Every block broken will drop random items.

upsidedowncrafting.name: Upside Down Crafting
description: This scenario flips all crafts upside down.

randomizedcrafts.name: Randomized Crafts
description: This scenario randomizes the results of all crafts.

monstersinc.name: Monsters Inc.
description: In this scenario all doors are linked as portals.

achievementhunter.name: Achievement Hunter
description: Players start with 5 hearts.
For every achievement players get a half heart of health.

nineslots.name: Nine Slots
description: You can only use your hotbar to hold items.

netherstart.name: Nether Start
description: You start the game in the nether.
